TopicTitle: I have a Bad Feeling about this...

Articles.Content:
Being an optimistic fan of Star Wars, I thought 'Heck, why not 8)?'and I developed this little craft here based off the iconic T-65 X-Wing from the original trilogy. If you have any ideas or your own Star Wars craft, post them here.

ABOUT THE CRAFT: No, I am not posting the craft file :\'(, since it requires specific parts to make from the Silisko Edition as well as the C-7 Flight Pack and the Probodyne Kit, and Nova really doesn\'t like it when you mix parts with his packs. Additionally, it will require you to download an entirely new KSP sub-version if you don\'t want to lose your data, which is quite tedious .

Make a Death Star!

Great job on the x-wing.
